verses.content: Chun, Jeriko zâwn Jordan va- pang, Moab phaia chun LALPAIN Mosie a biek a,
“Israel thlahai chu thu pe la, an ramahai chun Levi mihai umna ding khuohai siempêk raw hai se; chun, ran tlatna dingin khaw kâwl vêl- hai chu Levi mihai chu i pêk ding a nih.
Khuohai chu an umna ding nîng a ta, a vêlhai chu an bâwng le an ran, an thil vai po pohai ta dingin nîng a tih.
Khaw kâwl Levi mihai i pêk ding chu khaw kula inthawka tawng sâng khata hla a ni ding a nih.

Kul puotienga inthawkin in- khîng i ta, saktieng pangah tawng sâng hni, simtieng pangah tawng sâng hni; thlangtieng pangah tawng sâng hni, hmârtieng pangah tawng sâng hni, khuo a lai taka umin. Hi hi an khuo khawhnâwm nîng a tih.
Chun, Levi mihai i pêk ding khuohai chu tuolthathai tlânna dingin himna khuo paruk nîng a ta; chuong naw khawm chu khuo sâwmli pahni i pêk bawk ding a nih.
Levi mihai i pêk ding khuo po pohai chu khuo sâwmli pariet nîng a tih, an khawhnâwm seng pei leh.

Israel thlahai ihluo khuo i pêk dân chu a tam deua inthawk chun pe tam deu i ta; a tlâwm deua inthawk chun pe tlâwm i ta, pahnam tinin an hluo ram tam dân i zirin a khuo chu Levi mihai a pêk ding a nih,” tiin.
LALPA chun Mosie a biek a, “Israel thlahai hril la, an kuomah,
‘Jordan vadung in kai a, Kanaan ram in lût pha chun,
himna khuo ding in ruot ding a nih, tuolthat paltu tlânna dingin.
Chuong khuohai chu phuba- latua inthawka himna khuohai nîng an ta; pungkhâwmhai hmaa rorêlpêk dinga a ngir hmaa tuolthattu chu a thi nawna dingin.
Chuongchun, in ta dinga himna khuo in ruothai chu khuo paruk nîng a ta.
Jordan râlah khaw thum ruot in ta, Kanaan ramah khaw thum ruot in ta; himna khuohai nîng an tih.
Israel thlahai le hnam dang le an kuoma chênghai ta dingin hi khuo paruk hi himna khuohai nîng an tih, chutaka chun tukhawm mi that palhai chu an tlân ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, thîr hriemhrei hmanga mi a thawh a, a thi chun, tuolthat a nih, tuolthattu chu suk- hlum ngei ding a nih.
Chun, thina khawpa lunga mi a suk a, a thi chun tuolthat a nih, tuolthattu chu sukhlum ngei ding a nih.
Chun, thi khawpa thinga mi a vuok a, a thi chun tuolthat a nih, tuolthattu chu sukhlum ngei ding a nih.
Thisen phubalatu chun tuol- thattu chu that nghâl el a tih. A hmu pha pha a sukhlum el ding a nih.
Chun, mi a theida leia nam rak amanih, inchân rûka dênga a thiin amanih,
intaina leia a chum hlum amani chun a sukhlumtu chu sukhlum ve ngei nîng a tih; tuolthat a nih, thisen phubalatu chun a hmu pha pha a sukhlum el ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, intai lei khawm ni chuong loa, nam thut amanih, chun, inchân ni kher loa dêng amanih,
an um ti khawm hre loa, a hmêlma khawm ni loa, a pawitâwk khawm ni chuong loa, lungin ama- nih a dêng a, mi a lo thi dâm a ni chun,
pungkhâwmhaiin hieng rorêlna dân ang hin a sukhlumtu thisen phubalatu ro chu a rêlpêk ding a nih;

pungkhâwmhai chun tuolthattu chu thisen phubalatua inthawk chun hum an ta, pungkhâwmhai chun a tlânna, himna khuoa chun inumtir nâwk an ta, hriek inthienga nâl, thiempu lal a thi hmakhat chun chutaka chun a um ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, ienglai khawmin tuolthattu chu a tlânna, himna khaw ramri puotieng a feh a,
thisen phubalatuin a himna khaw puoa a hmuh a, thisen phu- balatuin a that chun thisena chun thiemnaw chang naw ni;
thiempu lal a thi hmakhat chun chu himna khuoa chun a um zing ding a ni leiin; thiempu a thi hnunga ruok chun tuolthattu chu a umna rama chun a kîr nâwk ding a nih.
Hieng thil hi in thlahai chena in umna taphawta in rorêl dân ding chu nîng a tih.
Tukhawma mi a that chun tuol- thattu chu hretuhai bâua inthawka thu suokin sukhlum ding a nih; ami- ruokchu, hretu pakhat chau chu, chu chu sukhlumna ding chun a hun nawh.
Chun, tuolthattu chu in intlan ding a ni nawh, thina khawpa thiem- naw chang a na, sukhlum ngei ding a ni lem.
Chun, thiempu thi hma chun a himna khuoa tlân, a rama um nâwk ding intlanna chu in lâk ding a ni nawh.

Chuongchun, in umna ram chu, sukpawrche ding a ni nawh, thisen chun ram chu in sukpawrche sih a, thisen suokna ram pawrche sâwpna ding chun thisen insuotu thisen ngawt naw chu hmang thei a ni si nawh a.
In umna ram, ka umna hi in sukpawrche ding a ni nawh, kei LALPA chu Israel thlahai lai hin ka um sih a,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
